title: BRIEF-Ctrip Reports ‍Diluted Earnings Per Ads Were Rmb0.88 (Us$0.14) For Q4
text: March 14, 2018 / 10:05 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Ctrip Reports ‍Diluted Earnings Per Ads Were Rmb0.88 (Us$0.14) For Q4 Reuters Staff March 14 (Reuters) - Ctrip.Com International Ltd: * CTRIP REPORTS UNAUDITED FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR OF 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE RMB 6.4 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW RMB 6.37 BILLION * ‍GROSS MARGIN WAS 83% FOR Q4 OF 2017, IMPROVING FROM 78% FOR SAME PERIOD OF 2016​ * ‍DILUTED EARNINGS PER ADS WERE RMB0.88 (US$0.14) FOR Q4 OF 2017​ * ‍FOR Q1 2018, EXPECTS NET REVENUE GROWTH TO CONTINUE AT A YEAR-ON-YEAR RATE OF APPROXIMATELY 9-11%​ * ‍NON-GAAP DILUTED EARNINGS PER ADS WERE RMB1.56 (US$0.24) FOR Q4 OF 2017​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW CNY 1.03, REVENUE VIEW CNY 6.37 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
